name: hub
description: A highly scalable, offline-first foundation with the best DX and a focus on performance and best practices

scripts.build:master: cross-env MATOMO_CUSTOMER_ID='2' MATOMO_CLIENT_ID='1' AG_GRID_LICENSE_KEY='$AG_GRID_LICENSE_KEY' FLATFILE_LICENSE_KEY='$FLATFILE_LICENSE_KEY' NODE_ENV=production SENTRY_ENV=master OKTA_CLIENT_ID=0oa1ggwie4MjCcxUj357 OKTA_ISSUER=https://granted.thedeliveryplatform.com/oauth2/thisIsATest webpack --config internals/webpack/webpack.prod.config.js --color --progress --hide-modules --display-optimization-bailout
scripts.build:prod: cross-env MATOMO_CUSTOMER_ID='5' MATOMO_CLIENT_ID='9' AG_GRID_LICENSE_KEY='$AG_GRID_LICENSE_KEY' FLATFILE_LICENSE_KEY='$FLATFILE_LICENSE_KEY' NODE_ENV=production SENTRY_ENV=production OKTA_CLIENT_ID=0oa35k1xuxJaef0Jr0i7 OKTA_ISSUER=https://clientrelationship.okta-emea.com/oauth2/aus35k19jtDoeQvEp0i7  webpack --config internals/webpack/webpack.prod.config.js --color --progress --hide-modules --display-optimization-bailout
scripts.build:staging: cross-env MATOMO_CUSTOMER_ID='2' MATOMO_CLIENT_ID='1' AG_GRID_LICENSE_KEY='$AG_GRID_LICENSE_KEY' FLATFILE_LICENSE_KEY='$FLATFILE_LICENSE_KEY' NODE_ENV=production SENTRY_ENV=staging OKTA_CLIENT_ID=0oa1ggwie4MjCcxUj357 OKTA_ISSUER=https://granted.thedeliveryplatform.com/oauth2/thisIsATest webpack --config internals/webpack/webpack.prod.config.js --color --progress --hide-modules --display-optimization-bailout
scripts.check-dependencies:
echo "ðŸš¨ Note this package doesn't allow you to ignore dependencies begining with @ for now so ignore them

" && depcheck --ignore-bin-package=true --ignores="babel-*,eslint-*,components,modules,services,tests,atoms,molecules,hoc,app,exports-loader,mochawesome,node-plop,tslint-react,eventsource-polyfill"
scripts.cypress:clientArea: echo "running Cypress tests relating to: CLIENT AREA "   && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/clientArea/**/*.feature'
scripts.cypress:core: echo "running Cypress tests relating to: HOMEPAGE"  && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/core/**/*.feature'
scripts.cypress:homepage: echo "running Cypress tests relating to: HOMEPAGE"  && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/homepage/**/*.feature'
scripts.cypress:organisations: echo "running Cypress tests relating to: ORGANISATIONS "  && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/organisations/**/*.feature'
scripts.cypress:permissions: echo "running Cypress tests relating to: PERMISSIONS " && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/permissions/**/*.feature'
scripts.cypress:products: echo "running Cypress tests relating to: PRODUCTS "  && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/products/**/*.feature'
scripts.cypress:safe: echo "running Cypress tests excluding quarantine"  && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/!(quarantine)/*.feature'
scripts.cypress:survey: echo "running Cypress tests relating to: SURVEY " && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/survey/**/*.feature'
scripts.cypress:surveyResponse: echo "running Cypress tests relating to: SURVEY REPONSE " && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/surveyResponse/**/*.feature'
scripts.cypress:units: echo "running Cypress tests relating to: UNITS " && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/units/**/*.feature'
scripts.cypress:users: echo "running Cypress tests relating to: USERS " && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/users/**/*.feature'
scripts.start:container: yarn && cross-env MATOMO_CUSTOMER_ID='8' MATOMO_CLIENT_ID='8' AG_GRID_LICENSE_KEY='$AG_GRID_LICENSE_KEY' FLATFILE_LICENSE_KEY='$FLATFILE_LICENSE_KEY' SENTRY_ENV=local OKTA_CLIENT_ID=0oa1ggwie4MjCcxUj357 OKTA_ISSUER=https://granted.thedeliveryplatform.com/oauth2/thisIsATest webpack-dev-server --config internals/webpack/webpack.container.config.js
scripts.start:prod: cross-env AG_GRID_LICENSE_KEY='$AG_GRID_LICENSE_KEY' FLATFILE_LICENSE_KEY='$FLATFILE_LICENSE_KEY' NODE_ENV=production SENTRY_ENV=cypress SENTRY_LINK="" OKTA_CLIENT_ID=0oa1ggwie4MjCcxUj357 OKTA_ISSUER=https://granted.thedeliveryplatform.com/oauth2/thisIsATest webpack --config internals/webpack/webpack.prod.config.js --color --progress --hide-modules --display-optimization-bailout && yarn serve -l 3000 -s build
scripts.start: yarn && cross-env MATOMO_CUSTOMER_ID='8' MATOMO_CLIENT_ID='8' AG_GRID_LICENSE_KEY='$AG_GRID_LICENSE_KEY' FLATFILE_LICENSE_KEY='$FLATFILE_LICENSE_KEY' SENTRY_ENV=local OKTA_CLIENT_ID=0oa1ggwie4MjCcxUj357 OKTA_ISSUER=https://granted.thedeliveryplatform.com/oauth2/thisIsATest webpack-dev-server --config internals/webpack/webpack.dev.config.js
scripts.test:jest: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TZ=GB OKTA_CLIENT_ID=MOCK_OKTA_CLIENT_ID OKTA_ISSUER=MOCK_OKTA_ISSUER jest --config internals/testing/jest.config.js
